website_summaries.verdict: A budget-friendly option that doesn't sacrifice power or quality.
pros: Powerful output tackles any cleaning job
“Total Stop System” trigger prolongs pump life and conserves energy
Comes with two detergent tanks and five quick-connect nozzles for light to heavy-duty cleaning
cons: Lengthy cords can be prone to twists and tangles

website_summaries.verdict: A effective electric power sprayer cleaner that saves energy with its automatic shut off feature.
pros: Automatic shut off when you are not using it
Easy to set up and use
Gets the patio, deck and outdoor furniture clean
A powerful sprayer for the price point
Easy to put together and use
cons: Not as powerful as many on the market, and seems to operate at a lower PSI than needed for many projects

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - DON'T BE AN IDIOT LIKE ME
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit twice. Don't be an idiot like me. Don't even purchase it once! First unit purchased 8/12/2017 stopped working completely within 7 months. The newest unit, purchased 4/14/2018, is leaking directly from the motor case (see video).
customer_reviews.author: Amina Baker, Exsect Inc

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Total junk! Unit quit working a couple days after return period expired! Do not recommend at all!!!! Compound this with the fact I'm now stuck with a pressure washer and have heard nothing from Snow Joe LLC. Buy locally at Home Depot or Lowes - at least you'll have a normal return period, have support right there in your own home town, and not be left high/dry by Amazon thousands of miles away.
customer_reviews.author: W. MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh good times.
customer_reviews.text: At this time I can't give a full review because a regular hose does not work on this machine. After discovering this myself I looked up other reviews on Amazon and the Sun Joe website to find out this has been a problem for years. I would have been OK with this if I knew upfront but Sun Joe says it works with any old hose you have. I have a few different hoses and not one will hook up without pulling out the rubber gasket on the machine. If you try that LOOK OUT! Water explosion everywhere. Ahhh good times.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: Plastic connector replaced with metal one in recent purchase by default
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The part that most people complained about seems to be replaced with a metal version.
customer_reviews.author: Jaewoo Song

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Be sure to request the metal hose connection once you've received and registered the product.
customer_reviews.text: Sooo glad we bought this, works excellent. We did take the advice of previous posters by registering it online once we got it. Then minutes later we called their customer support and they immediately found the registration and sent us the metal part that attaches to the hose within days. I had the feeling they knew what we needed right away. No hassle or questions asked, and it was completely free. Thanks to you all for your awesome posting, otherwise we'd have never known to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Momazon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research when it came down to getting a electric pressure washer and hands down this thing did not disappoint. I would recommend this pressure washer to anyone! I bought for my car detailing. I also bought the MTM Hydro Foam Cannon! These two together are AMAZING! Here is a link to my youtube channel to show these 2 products off.[...]
customer_reviews.author: TTorres1183

customer_reviews.title: Burned out during 2nd use,
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 11/14/2015. Prime delivery not a problem. Used 1 time in November 2015 for about 3 hours with no problem, Next use April 20, 2016. worked for 2 hours then unit started smoking and smell of overheated electrical motor. Let cool 2 hours. Tried again. Immediate over heated engine smell. Unit ran but psi was low. When I tried to replace through Amazon. It was out of date for and not able to return or replace.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: OFF TO A BAD BAD START
customer_reviews.text: Off to a very bad start. Have not used the washer yet, so this is about how the package was received. The Amazon box was fine however, when it was opened the manufacturers box was damaged with a large hole. Once opened there were many pieces some in clear bags, others not. In addition, there are no instructions on how to assemble the unit....where do all these parts go? I am afraid once I do figure out how to assemble...it will not work..I feel this is a refurbished unit which isn't what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great once
customer_reviews.text: This would have been five stars, had it not broken on the second use! I love this power washer and hoped to use it for years. Instead, I used it exactly once – and it worked great cleaning our kids' pink chalk drawings off our next door neighbor's white marble steps. :P I was blown away, recommended it to friends - but then the second time I turned it on, to clean my own steps, I heard a loud popping noise, and now it no longer works. Really bummed about this, and looks like I'm outside the return window. Any advice appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: jkent

customer_reviews.title: ....and it failed after 4 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Sun Joe SPX3000 and it failed after 4 uses........right after warranty ran out. Had a two year Square Trade warranty which stated it started after the manufacturer warranty ran out but now they say the warranty started on the purchase date so they won't cover it. Very poor. Will never buy Sun Joe or Square Trade again. 4/27/19 --- New information. Square Trade may be coming through after my persistence in pursuing this issue. I will update my review pending the resolution of this issue......stand by.
customer_reviews.author: Tempest M Parker

customer_reviews.title: non standard m22 x 15mm hose connections !
customer_reviews.text: seems to work ok. be aware that their hose and connections are an m22 x 15mm connection. not the standard m22 x 14 standard connection which most hoses and accessories in the U.S. are.you cant just by a standard extension hose and expect it to work without buying special adapters. however the connection coming out of the end of the gun is m22 x14mm so accessories such as a standard foam cannon should work. i suppose you can buy their brand special hose and it would work but i don't really know for sure. annoying that they don't bother mentioning this in their product description
customer_reviews.author: cmj

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable appliance.  Company will not stand by warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Unreliable: The pressure washer stopped working two moths after purchase. To maker it worse, the company will not stand behind the warranty: I tried to call the company - they don't answer the phone. I used the live chat - had to wait approximately one hour until an agent showed up. The agent wrote - they will send and email with RMA in 3-5 days - nothing happened. Called again a week later - waited an hour for live chat - the agent apologized - and wrote they will send an email with RMA in 2 days - nothing happened. It's been three weeks and hours in waiting - they clearly have no intention of standing behind the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Ofer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful enough for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Cleaned my filthy concrete porches, brick wall, and planters wonderfully. Didn't use it for much more so I can't say much about how long it will hold up. I hope for a long time, but it did what I wanted it to for now. Pleased with it for what I paid. Sharing some pictures of before and after, the flower shows how well it cleaned the concrete porch, which had a lot of black run-off from the roof, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Be Told

customer_reviews.title: Validated that there was very good water pressure with the same results
customer_reviews.text: Received the wasner promptly and assembled the unt without any problems. It has taking me 6 weeks to try it out because of a foot injury. I hooked up the water and the pump will not run. Reset the GFCI and no help. Validated that there was very good water pressure with the same results. Will be returning the unit to amazon. Disappointed, was looking forward to getting chores done.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: RUST!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the pressure washer during Prime day sale in 2016. I have used the pressure washer couple of times in 2016. Now in 2017 when I want to use it the provided tips are rusted. When I use these rusted attachments the pressure washer does not work. The attachment which connects the pressure washer to the hose is also weak and leaks water.
customer_reviews.author: Hima

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.  But VERY light duty.
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first pressure washer. I've moved a lot so I've bought and sold quite a few. This one seemed like a good deal, and it does work somewhat, but there are some issues. 1. The pressure isn't very high. Really set in stains don't budge unless you're right on top of them. 2. The detergent dispensers just don't work. I checked and double checked and everything looks right, but the pick up tubes aren't getting any detergent out of the bottles. 3. The sprayer's hose is really short, so I hope your garden hose is plenty long. All and all, not a bad pressure washer. I mean, it's pretty cheap. So expectations should be low.
customer_reviews.author: Philly Buster

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product! It is cheaply made of plastic. The detergent tanks quit working. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TRADER

customer_reviews.title: Amazon needs to correct there process to ensure quality product
customer_reviews.text: I am angry, my trust is broken. I am not angry on the manufacture or seller. It’s more on Amazon. Off late I have started buying more on Amazon as I don’t feel safe going to store. This product is a scam, had more then 20 or 30 thousand review. How can company like amazon sell this product on their site. I am not sure how they got so many good review because the product is not good enough. I will like to see some corrections done by amazon else I personally will never buy from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Raman

customer_reviews.title: FOAM!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for one thing and one thing only.... FOAM CANNON CAR WASH!!!!!!!! I was very disappointed when the only pictures I saw were of people washing their driveways and fences. But wait!!! Here you are! The best car wash review!!! I bought a cheap foam cannon (here on amazon) MATCC Adjustable Foam Cannon 33 fl. oz. You do not need an adapter or anything special it works perfect! This is a great power washer! I have used it 4 times so far and have no complaints. Its ELECTRIC! (did you see what I did there?)
customer_reviews.author: LMF dot Com

customer_reviews.title: Bad then GOOOOD!
customer_reviews.text: First off I wanna say Amazon needs to have a long talk with their delivery drivers. A Hertz driver pulled up with my large box and slammed it on my porch without a care in the world! If it was THAT heavy she should have used a dolly but no she was in a rush and body slammed my two packages. Okay, now on to the product. I love the Sun Joe washer so far no problems at all. Quickly cleaned my walkway in my backyard but fell short due to the length of the pressure holes so I ordered the 25 foot extension holes. Great product will recommend to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Help!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered by the time i got home from work. i set it up and hooked up all the parts. turned the water on and the bottom of the pressure washer was leaking water everywhere. what brass piece do i need to fix this problem before i return it???
customer_reviews.author: joel ugrovics

customer_reviews.title: Avoid Warehouse Deals on this.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful of the "Warehouse Deals". Unfortunately, this was out of stock "new" and we took a chance ordering from the "warehouse deals". It was to be in "very good" condition and cost nearly as much as the new version, but when we got it put together, it did not function. The power worked, but it would not pressure wash. Some of the parts were rusty. I will probably give it one more chance with a new purchase as it is now back in stock. Hoping that we get the good results than many other people did.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D

customer_reviews.title: Top Pressure Washer ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Very good pressure washer and amazing results, I LIKE IT
customer_reviews.author: Sammer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect! A powerful water-saving pressure washer!
customer_reviews.text: We love this pressure washer! It’s easy to assemble and super easy to use. One of the best features is the auto water shut off when the trigger is not engaged. That saves so muc water!! The only thing I would change if I could is the ability to access the soap at the same time I’m using a power washer adapter. With this model you apply the soap with one nozzle adapter and then you have to change to a pressure washer adapter. Other than that—it’s a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Siloy

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great - Until an O-ring Failure
customer_reviews.text: I used this pressure washer for the first time three weeks ago. Its perfect for what I do (mainly washing down my house and occasional car wash). However, yesterday (5/17/20) I took the washer out to clean another side of my house only to find a huge spurt of water gushing out of the wand. I took the metal rod which attaches to the "gun" and saw that the o-ring sealing the two parts together was broken. Now I need to spend time going to a hardware store trying to find an appropriately sized o-ring. All of this for a product I bough less than 30 days prior and have only used twice.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: No more powerful than a garden hose with a simple sprayer attachment, turned to the "jet" setting
customer_reviews.text: Completely ineffective. I can get just as much pressure with a garden hose and a $10 sprayer attachment (turned to the jet setting). I bought the "quick-connect turbo head" with it because some of the reviews said it was necessary in order to obtain adequate pressure, but the pressure was far from adequate. Now I see why the "commercial-type" (expensive) pressure washers are rated for pressures far higher than 2000 PSI -- the Sun Joe just doesn't do the job. After wasting quite a while assembling the unit, I tried it, then tried it with the turbo head, then returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's a time and money suck and I don't have any spare time
customer_reviews.text: Absolute JUNK. I used it about four times and then the pump went out. The pump spins and spins but won't produce any pressure, and now I've got to find a box big enough to send this piece of trash back to Amazon in. Never heard of the "Sun Joe" brand before, and will absolutely never buy one again. Now I've got to go rent a pressure washer to get things ready for a kids camp next week. If you're a busy person who depends on your equipment working when you need it, avoid this brand at all cost. It's more than worthless, it's a time and money suck and I don't have any spare time...
customer_reviews.author: SamB

customer_reviews.title: A review from someone who has never used or bought a pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried about purchasing this with no experience using a pressure washer or knowing anyone who has one to ask advice about getting my own. I wanted this mostly for pressure washing concrete and cleaning outside of my home. It worked better than I expected it to with not one issue. It was easy to assemble and use within 15 minutes. If you’re a first time pressure washer buyer I’d recommend this 1000%. I do not regret my purchase and would purchase one as a gift for a family member or friend who likes things tidy!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Sun Joe SPX3000 about 6 weeks and used it 3 times. It works just fine and is much easier to use than the gas powered pressure washer I used to lug around. Although not as powerful as gas powered units, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: AugsburgTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware! Horrible fire hazard!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible! Purchased the first one and within a year, it started smoking. The company then replaced it under warranty. Got the second one which I was told would only have a 90 day warranty. Used it once that fall for about an hour. Spring came around so I hooked it up to clean a kiddie pool and pool steps. Got the pool steps started but after about 15 minutes, the replacement unit started to smoke and shut off. Won’t turn back on. No extension cord was used at any time and they were plugged into a gfic outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S.

customer_reviews.title: Contacted Sun Joe by phone (not easy to do) and they seemed aware of dysfunction
customer_reviews.text: Threading to garden hose is engineering incorrectly. Contacted Sun Joe by phone (not easy to do) and they seemed aware of dysfunction. Not sure why they didn't fix it before shipping. Said they would send new part but I needed to register product online and call back again. Website extremely slow to load but finally got in. Waiting on part now but VERY FRUSTRATED as had time scheduled for deck staining this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of S!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand how you are not allowed to return some thing like this. When you use it once. I bought this at the end of June. I think I used it in July. And I’m trying to use it again and it is the second week in October. And the motor around for maybe two seconds and then shut off and I cannot get it to start again. And after reading many of the reviews that’s common. But yet I’m not allowed to return this thing. Over $100?
customer_reviews.author: J. shaffer

customer_reviews.title: This not a good buy, The Hose connector that come with it ...
customer_reviews.text: This not a good buy, The Hose connector that come with it will not fit a standard hose, So after going to Home depot and wasting my time trying to find something to make this work I was told to look on the website, Oh great I have to buy an adapter so I can use this thing without the water spraying all over the place from the front of the machine. Doesn;t seem to have a lot of pressure either. I had kept it in the box in my garage as I was oin the process of doing somr work on my house so too late to return, Or I would have sent it back without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Dee G.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! After having a gas power washer, this is soooo quiet. Also powerful and gets the job done. This isn't as powerful as gas but adequate for my needs. Very frugal with soap dispensing. Took 64oz to power wash entire 3 bedroom house. I find myself disassembling the wand for storage since it is so easy. Also, mine has a metal hose connector. I have noticed a little rusty water coming out of the high pressure outlet. Not sure that's good.
customer_reviews.author: tskiki

customer_reviews.title: Leaked to the point of being utterly useless
customer_reviews.text: Have held off writing this review even though I abandoned the product after 3 months because it blew water out of unintended places. I wondered whether our very high water pressure was the problem. Well it's NOT. Recently purchased a WHOLSUN 3,000 PSI electric power washer, assembled it carefully, just like the Sun Joe, and it works perfectly. Thus, I can now conclude that this Sun Joe machine was, frankly, a piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: MickMacs

customer_reviews.title: Better Now
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer failed to work after it was assembled and set up out of the box. After reading a review by someone with a similar experience, I suspected the problem was in the electric connection that includes a GFS safety feature. The replacement part was about $20. (I generally return items that fail to work out of the box). After installing the new plug, the washer started as it should and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: A workhorse
customer_reviews.text: This little pressure washer has been a workhorse. I have owned it four years now and use it many times each year cleaning patios, outdoor furniture, house siding, boat, kayaks, etc. It has never failed to work. I've done nothing to it....likely abused it....and it has not had a single problem. I like the electric pressure washers since you don't need to remember to have gasolene on hand and it's far more quiet than a gas model. The trade off is the cord and it sometimes gets tangled with the hose but that is the case with any electric pressure washer. I will buy another just like it when, and if, this one dies.
customer_reviews.author: John Haslam

customer_reviews.title: Not as Expected very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product was touted to be the best and from reviews online. However it didn't do anything to the stains on my driveway or my entry sidewalk. Needless to say I was very disappointed in performance, wo I take it to back and used it around the pool same results. I'm not sure how everyone is getting this machine to provide the miraculous results. However, perhaps this machine may do okay for your stains if not serious...
customer_reviews.author: Kanani

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Putting in the screws to attach the parts showed how cheaply made this was, be careful lugging it around. The initial nozzle I wanted to use was plugged up. Unfortunately the pin that is suppose to come with the product to unplug nozzles was nowhere to be found. I have yet to use this nozzle. This is also highly sensitive, it will pulse randomly sometimes and I havent even moved the hoses or anything, its not a pressure problem. Lastly, since they use metric connections, you have to buy an adapter to fit your different attachments. Overall it does what it is suppose to to, but it also shows you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to buy a power washer for a while, reading reviews, talking to folks that have one, etc. That said, I finally took the leap and bought this one. I love it! Easy to put together, using it takes a little practice at first, but once you get it, its hard to put it down!!!! Picture shows my 18 year old son with it on our driveway! He loves it. If you are a little OCD, you will love watching things go from dirty to clean! This was a great purchase for us, particularly where we are doing a lot of chores during Covid stay at home. Next up my windows and my house!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen J.

customer_reviews.title: Sun Joe + quick connections for the win!
customer_reviews.text: If buying the Sun Joe SPX3000 (B00CPGMUXW), then it will connect perfectly with MATCC Car Washer Gun with 3/8 connection (B075V2XCRJ), and the Pressure Washer Adapter Fittings M22-15(B07SJSY6G8). This way you get a nice quick connect option to when you don't need the long wand such as car washes. For the washer itself, the top plastic component kept falling off, I drill it together with small screws and it's rock solid and perfect now. Coming up on 6 years since purchase date.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the deck-patio cleaning attachment, used it for 10 minutes, fell apart, now in my trash can, $10 junk. Water hose attachment to the pressure washer leaks. Pressure hose excessively stiff and difficult to manage. Power cord twisted and difficult to manage (if they would package the power cord in a circular fashion, I think it would help keep the cord from being deformed). Pressure is adequate for household jobs, at least that part of my purchase is satisfactory. I had a Karcher pressure washer for years and wish I had purchased another instead of the Sun Joe.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: ok pressure washer...
customer_reviews.text: The pressure washer was easy to put together. It is not as powerful as I had hoped it would be. I got it to wash down the siding on a metal barn. It does not reach very high with sufficient pressure and volume. It seems like it is better suited to washing decks, concrete patios, fences, cars etc., which is what I will end up using it for. It was not nearly as powerful as gas powered pressure washers I have used, but I probably had too great of an expectation, especially at its price point. It is very light and easy to maneuver around, and has a decent 25' hose.
customer_reviews.author: wdh

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is tall with a pull handle. It is easy to maneuver around quickly and has the power to clean our deck, concrete blocks and sidewalk. It has different nozzles, but I found it hard to get off to place another on, but I really only need one. I washed my large picture windows as well. Very useful tool. I found it helpful to buy a short 3 foot hose to attach to the unit which makes hooking up water easier. I keep the cord looped into the holder and just use an extension cord so I can go as far as I can before pulling the unit to a new location. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning Ability Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Goes together fairly easily and quickly. Maneuvers easily. If you plan to use this to wash the siding on your house, do not waste your money. It does not have enough power to wash off mildew, bird droppings or heavy dirt. The only thing it cleans is light dust/dirt. If you need to clean off mildew, bird droppings or heavy dirt buy a heavy bristled broom/brush and a good sprayer to attach to your hose. Tried using for power washing the deck. It takes forever to do an 8x10 foot area and do it well. Really think about what you want in your purchase before purchasing this washer.
customer_reviews.author: CDA

customer_reviews.title: High quality and works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great with ample power. I like that it comes complete with 5 nozzles, long hose, long electric cord, etc. . I did have trouble with dispensing detergent from the bottles. Apparently you have to use the soap nozzle which wasn't mentioned. Only other problem was the hose connection leaked badly until I added a second washer to the adapter where the garden hose connects. I like that it is quiet compared to a gasoline model and I've gone all electric so I don't have to keep a gas can in the garage. Overall it is a great little pressure washer and I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working on second use.
customer_reviews.text: Used it to wash my car and worked fine. Had it out today to wash the house and it stopped halfway through and would not start again. I went to the manual and it said it was the fuse but gives no direction to where the fuse is, how to replace it, or what fuse to replace it with. I Googled, YouTubed, checked Reddit and didn't see anything about the fuse. I found mentions of the fuse here but no specifics. I have been on chat for 30+ minutes for someone to tell me that someone else will get back to me in a couple of days. One of the worst purchases I have made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hickman

customer_reviews.title: No power but elbow grease
customer_reviews.text: This item is build well and precise well but if you are using it to deep clean any surface, even with detergents to help, the psi per gallon just can’t get the job. I found another one. Almost identical design with 3500psi and up to 2.6 gallon per min. When it comes to a tool like this. A tool I don’t use often. I don’t spend a lot of money on it but still want it to do the job without 100times the elbow grease. It’s it doesn’t last 10 years I can’t accept that but it still needs to have the power to so what’s it was intended. That’s you
customer_reviews.author: The Scarpa’s

customer_reviews.title: Solid but with Limitations
customer_reviews.text: Had this unit for about 9 months now. This is a solid unit for the money. Easy to transport, easy to hookup and use; cables and hoses are long enough for most projects around the house. House windows, fences, siding, auto, trash cans, etc wash easily. Conversely, concrete stairs, sidewalks, and bricks take some umpffff and you'll be bent over with the gun really close to the ground, you'll get it clean nevertheless but some work is required as it's just not strong enough to perform that task. Alloy rims...nope
customer_reviews.author: LUKE S.

customer_reviews.title: nice economical unit
customer_reviews.text: very effective, you can adjust pressure simply by changing tips for different coverage angles. nice long elec cord and power hose, so you can move it some distance to where you need it. cleans off dirt like a champ, even on old deck wood. does not strip off old stain, but gets at the dirt. i did have a problem that developed after a couple days with time delay to build up pressure. but when i contacted the manufacturer, they agreed to send a replacement with no argument at all. good company to deal with, easy to contact by phone or e-mail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned with ease
customer_reviews.text: Used this on area around my pool, and my white fence and it works great! I’ve never used a water pressure machine before but I would highly recommend this one. I needed my husbands help to lift it and move it out to the pool area because it’s a tad heavy, but from there I could just wheel it around myself. Used it with and without the detergent soap I bought separately . I think it works just as well without but the soap did smell nice! There is still some dark spots I will have to go back for maybe with bleach but overall I’m happy with it
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear3

customer_reviews.title: BUY A CLOTHES WASHER HOSE
customer_reviews.text: The hose connecting dongle that is included is incredibly finicky. I could never get it to connect without it seriously leaking. I learned if you take the dongle off the pressure washer, you can connect a clothes washer hose instead. You can then connect the other side of the clothes washer hose to a standard garden hose or spigot. Doing this was the first time I ever got it to work without leaking. It's also kind of convenient because then it has a short built in hose that you don't need to mess with.
customer_reviews.author: akya

customer_reviews.title: I Wish Electric Chord & High Pressure Hose STORAGE on the  UNIT was neater & thought of.
customer_reviews.text: - Electric Chord & High Pressure Hose STORAGE on the UNIT is A MESS, they are straggling all over. - I just got done assembling the unit after viewing several YouTube videos & the instructions booklet. I am a home owner, not a commercial expert who installs such regularly. I will start using it after rains stop. How about including the pictures of the different parts beside when you list the parts ??? - More to come after using it, & hoping something good.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping it would at least wash my car!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a pressure washer that has a lot of power to its spray, this one is NOT for you. Sadly, it barely washed the bug splatter off my car. We wanted to use it to pressure wash our deck to get all the loose paint chips off but that didn't work either. We used various tips but still not what the video showed on this site. We have very good pressure coming from the faucet so we know that isn't the problem. Just very disappointed. However, it did wash the mud off the inside of the Jeep door!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda P.

customer_reviews.title: Only for small projects use. Not for vehicles for larger projects. Cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer wasn’t whati was expecting for having 10k reviews and 4.5 stars. I used this to clean my motorcycle and ATVs. It’s cheap plastic. Doesn’t have a wide range nozzle. Not enough pressure either. I mean it works for the regular home owner that just wants to use it for little around the house projects. I tried using it to wash my diesel truck... this isn’t the washer you want for trucks. I will be returning this. False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Derek B

customer_reviews.title: Still working after 5 years of extensive use.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had mine for 5 years now. Use it to wash 3 cars almost weekly. Had to replace the GFCI power connector earlier this year. Make sure you have water on before turning washer on. In winter, make sure to get water out of pump (shut water off, turn on and spray to empty). Wish the original hose was longer. Added SunJoe 25’ extension, zip tied the 15.ft because I only needed 5-10’ extra length. I usually go through these electric pressure washers every 2 years but this one is still going.
customer_reviews.author: prh

customer_reviews.title: Happy w it for the price and the power
customer_reviews.text: Its what you would expect for a home version. Its gonna take a little extra time to clean the deck do to the tight beam needed to get the power up. It works well and if you want to clean the grime off of almost ANYTHING it will. I clean the garbage cans. the rocks in the garden toys and whatever else you can imagine. setup is a bit annoying but the connections are strong. Its always a challenge moving around w awire and a hose but its light enough and it works good. I like it
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Burke

customer_reviews.title: Sun Joe SPX3000 - a product (compressor) failure (wish I had $$$ refunded)
customer_reviews.text: Sun Joe SPX3000 Pressure Washer: This system failed the second summer of slight use. I underscore slight usage. System was used with care. Light duty. I would not recommend this model to the average homeowner. Consider a gas engined pressure washer first! Sun Joe SPX3000 Pressure failed unit which should be re engineered for longevity or totally taken out of production. It was leaky and the compressor unit failed totally. Actual hours used: 4 1/2. Wish I had refund my $$$, option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable and easy to use - great for car washes!
customer_reviews.text: I have a gas pressure washer, but was looking for something a bit more practical for car washes. It is still early, but it has been working great so far. It was not difficult to assemble and certainly much more convenient for my purpose than the gas engine, in addition to being quieter. I also bought the Scuddles foam cannon kit and together they work beautifully. The unit is not as powerful as the gas alternative I have, but it was not designed to be and can be determined just by looking at the specs. However, it can also be use effectively on projects around the house. I highly recommend it based on my experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gomide

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and set it up......because I already have a gasoline Honda Pressure washer I was hesitant to purchase an electric unit. But it exceeded my expectations.....easy set up, high enough pressure to clean outdoor shades and furniture...look as good as new.....I'll next try it out on my concrete patio and driveway. And, best of all, no more messing with temperamental gas engines, mixed fuel, etc........ Check out the attached photo of some concrete stairs I cleaned today with the Sun Joe...on the right is the "before" (embedded dirt, mold, mildew, etc) and on the left side is "after" I power washed the steps with the Sun Joe........I'm very happy with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Robuck

customer_reviews.title: Portable, Inexpensive but tough enough to do medium duty projects
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing. It is not too heavy, easy to setup and powerful enough to do what I needed it to do. I have used it on the following so far: 1) My front porch to remove chipped paint (in conjunction with an attachment that helps remove paint) 2) Clean my back deck to prepare it for staining 3) Clean mold off of the siding on my garage 4) Clean a deck containing mold/mildew Check out the photos/video - they say it all
customer_reviews.author: MWhisk

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!!!
customer_reviews.text: As some of the reviews state it is completely garbage. YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!! Keep that in mind. First, it doesn’t output 3000psi as it advertises. Second, if you are trying to deep clean some dirty decks or siding you will spend 2 times the time and water. Third, if you try to hook up any existing long telescoping wands you are out of luck. If you are buying to wash your car and some very basic cleaning that should be ok. Just don’t use it very often at all otherwise it will burnout like mine did.
customer_reviews.author: Edessa

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, no hassle
customer_reviews.text: I’m selling my house and needed to clean my garage, porch, etc...This thing works incredibly well and is powerful for being electric. My only complaint would be maneuverability as you have a garden hose, an electric cord and a hose connected to the spray gun. Kind of a pain to move with you but that’s pretty minor overall. It’s not as heavy as I envisioned it, so it does tip over from time to time. For the price, this thing is great and will work for average joes like me doing fairly basic tasks with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W

customer_reviews.title: Broke During Second Use
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice and it stopped working during the second use. Plug felt warm to the touch so I thought if I let it cool it would work again but it doesn't. Won't turn on. Reset and test buttons don't work. Bought the brush but didn't even get a chance to use it. Hopefully they'll replace it due to the 2 year warranty. We'll see. I'll post and let everyone know if they do.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine J.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a small pressure washer to do small jobs like the back deck, lawn furniture, wooden swing and our long walkway. Well, I've done all that and contemplating doing our driveway. I love this pressure washer!! I saw it used on the EvanandKatelyn YouTube channel and the reviews were very good so I bought it and so glad I did. It's got a lot of pressure. I'm not good at writing reviews but I highly recommend the Sun Joe SPX3000.
customer_reviews.author: DaughterB

customer_reviews.title: Effective and enough power for typical home use
customer_reviews.text: Apart from the assembly instructions which are a bit difficult to decipher (hey manufacturers - photos tell the story much better than your line drawings), assembly took about 15 minutes and was fairly easy. Need a phillips screwdriver and a scissors or knife to separate some parts from the packaging. Hooked it up and it was good to go. No leaks, responsive trigger with instant shutoff, long power cord and hose for this type of power washer, metal wand, and well designed and built connectors. Decent power for my purposes powerwashing vinyl siding, maple porch boards, cedar deck. I'd buy this again, but hope this lasts many years before I consider doing so.
customer_reviews.author: rmpfish

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I had a little bit of a problem with assembly. But, when I figured out, using a magnifying glass, what the instruction pictures were trying to show me I had to disassemble a few pieces. The power of the machine is extraordinary, can't comment on how long the machine will last. I have washed three cars, two side walks, two porches, and the front of my house. So over all, I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pressure Washer
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. High quality couplings and hoses. Powerful electric pressure washer. A few things- the instructions state attach the handle with 4 screws, but there were only 2 screw holes on the handle, and it works with two. I spent a few minutes investigating for two more screw holes. The hose holder could have an extra 1/2" to hold the hose more securely. And the cord holder could have been up higher so the wheels don't run over the hanging cord. I spent an enjoyable afternoon cleaning my deck and vinyl siding. I used plain water to see how well it cleans, and it does a fine job.
customer_reviews.author: ca christianson

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to start
customer_reviews.text: This item is pretty much easy to use. No pulling or adding gas, just hook up hose and plug in. It is perfect for women or people that have a hard time pulling on a cord to get it started. It will do a smaller job nicely but I find for heavier jobs it is not the best one to use. We have a gas washer as well and it does a much better job for tuff things to clean, but once again it is much harder to operate. Overall it is a handy item to have for the people that need an easier washer to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Lin9153

customer_reviews.title: Leaks from the bottom - Customer Service Does not call back
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give Sun Joe a great review, but my unit leaks heavily from the bottom. I tried calling Sun Joe on he 866 number provided. I was never able to get through. I tried calling again on July 22nd. After holding for too long I used the call back feature and left my phone number. Nobody called back. On July 24th I tried calling again and the same thing happened. I left my call back number and never received a call back. Hello?
customer_reviews.author: gary m. boer

customer_reviews.title: NO Additional Parts To Order / NO Plastic Connectors
customer_reviews.text: June 2020 There are NO additional connectors/attachments you have to buy. There are NO plastic connectors/attachments. Connectors are Brass & metal. I read many low reviews stating they had to order certain things to attach the hose, and that connectors were stripped bc made of plastic . This ISN'T TRUE....now anyway. Maybe they've upgraded things. I'm glad I wasn't scared off by bad reviews. Has good power & had no problem cleaning siding with Krud Cutter. BTW- Some Youtube videos are online, showing how to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: MJESSE

customer_reviews.title: I am NOT HAPPY with getting just two summers out of machine that ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pressure washer last year. I have used it two summers...I could not be MORE UNHAPPY with a product that I have received from Amazon. This machine leaks at the hose connection and there is NO WAY to get it to stop. I am NOT HAPPY with getting just two summers out of machine that I only bought to clean my deck. I will not buy SUN JOE again.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I thought this unit would last for a one time job cleaning a deck. Then I used it to clean a garage floor, the underbody of my truck, and the siding on the house. Pulled it out yesterday and spent three hours nonstop cleaning a different, bigger deck. It took the dirt and black mildew completely and easily off fast. The whole time I expected the unit’s motor to shutdown or burn out. It kept on going perfectly. I completely feel it was worth the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, convenient tool for small jobs. Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: It's not the most powerful pressure washer, but it's cheap and small and easy to move around. Easy to set up and easy to clean up and put away. For simple jobs around a house, like cleaning the car, cleaning moss off a roof, cleaning a sidewalk, etc... it does the trick nicely. However, mine sprung a leak after a few uses, just after the Amazon return window closed. It leaks through a connection between the handle and the wand end.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Rated one of the top pressure washers for a reason
customer_reviews.text: After watching multiple reviews of pressure washers, I've narrowed my decision down to the Sun Joe SPX3000 and my expectations were met. I've mainly used the spx3000 for car washes as well as cleaning the side of my house and backyard. The multiple nozzles helped as I use the 60 for car and 45 for the house. Everything was easy to setup and install. The only complaint that I have is that the front of the pressure washer is the hose nozzle while the back is the pressure washer hose. I wished that it was the other way around so it would make sense. Other than that, everything was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and gets the job done wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a pressure washer before in my life, but this one was simple to set up and easy to use. Changing the spray heads are the easiest thing ever! I was able to quickly switch between spray heads conveniently stored on the machine itself. Super long cord made the need for an extension cord unnecessary. I used mine for 6 hours straight the first day without any issues. I cannot recommend this washer enough!
customer_reviews.author: Majorkl

customer_reviews.title: It works fine but it is made of very cheap metal.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this 3 times since I purchased it and have had no problems with it working. But only after 3 uses and roughly one months, the connectors have already rusted. If that is any indication as to the material quality of the pump itself then there is going to be a bach'r problem with the rust only internals unless you use a product that is specifically meant to save from rust. I would definitely recommends using a product's after each use to help prevents rust build-up and side of the pressure washer. Other than that I do not have any problems what this product.
customer_reviews.author: NottaReviewer

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Complete and utter garbage. The pressure is fine when it's functioning properly, but that's the problem -- ours has broken twice in 2 years. The warranty covered the first issue (internal leak, which caused constant pulsing) but now the new one broke AGAIN (cracked plastic connector piece on spray gun). The thing still has the manufacterer's tape around the cord because we've only used it ONCE since receiving it. Cheaply built and just plain bad. Next time we're going to invest in something decent. We were weary about buying a cheaper electric pressure washer instead of investing in a gas-powered one. Definitely made the WRONG decision in buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Intermittent
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after one use. Will not power on. Now I have a power washer and no box to return it. I would reccomend looking at another brand..........update.....after contacting customer service we got the thing running. Somewhat user error on my part. The pressure washer works, however it takes awhile to build and hold pressure. You can hear the pump ramp up in speed and slow down, really struggles to maintain pressure but then it will just work fine?
customer_reviews.author: MTibo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! I use it for everything! I’ve cleaned two huge oriental rugs, I hose out the dog yard, I clean out the horse trough, I’ve cleared the mud off the driveway after some dirt work was done. Super easy to use, fairly quiet, good quality all around. The hose is super heavy duty as is the power cord and they are both really long so you can get WAY away from the house with it. It’s awesome. Best money I’ve spent in a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey

customer_reviews.title: It broke on the second day of use.
customer_reviews.text: It broke on the second day of use. I was really happy with this washer until i wanted to use the soap containers. Right after i filled a soap containers with the soap and turned the unit on it just quit working. The switch goes off every time i am trying to turn it on. It seems like the soap leaked inside of the unit somewhere. This washer goes back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: NewVoros

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I am not the best at using outside power tools or machines. I ordered this based on the reviews that I have seen on Amazon, and I have to say that I am over please with my purchase. The price is amazing, and it was easy to put together. It works great. I used it to clean my porch, which has not been cleaned in 2 years, and it now looks like the porch when I moved into my home. I recommend this product and you need this for your home.
customer_reviews.author: Mez

customer_reviews.title: Not bad value, but it has it's quirks
customer_reviews.text: This worked out well overall. I used this to clean off my pool deck (concrete), and a wood deck without issues. Both look great after cleaning. Don't expect huge speed on touch surfaces (get a gas washer if you need to use it regurarly on large surfaces). But for the occasional use homeowner this is great. Found I use the 15o head most of the time. My only gripes: * The wond is a bit short, I find I (6'0") need to bend over slightly to reach the ground, I cannot stand up streight and use it * The soap dispenser only draws soap when using the soap head, any of the pressure heads will NOT draw any soap
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: Had to Replace, but Replacement Worked
customer_reviews.text: In the end, it worked fine. However, the first one we bought only worked for about 20 minutes and then got some sort of electrical problem and just wouldn't do anything (when connected to power, the GFI plug just clicked a lot and then stopped -- the pump never started). Ultimately, we had to register it with SunJoe, then return it to SunJoe and they replaced it. The replacement has been working fine, but these are clumsy objects to have to assemble, then disassemble for return, repackage and take to UPS, and then assemble the replacement. Probably would have been smarter to buy it at a local store.
customer_reviews.author: W. McTeer

customer_reviews.title: Good for very small jobs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the good reviews despite my reservations about an electric power washer. The unit does better than a garden hose, but the difference is not worth of having an additional unit. I found that I couldn't remove bugs off the front of my car or anything more than surface level dirt from my garage floor. Ultimately, it will depend on your usage, but if you have a project of any substance in mind; I would recommend another route.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I wrote this earlier but when I called customer service they were great about sending the needed part. So I'm upgrading my rating to a 4. I only used this product 5 times last year. I went to use it this year and the wand broke. The metal nut came out and won't stay in when water pressure comes through the want. I tried hammering it in place but it still comes out. I'm still waiting to hear back from customer support, but i'm disappointed that its not more stable. When it works, it works pretty good and its basically small enough to store and schlepp around.
customer_reviews.author: Upcreek

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great; heavy to move around.
customer_reviews.text: Although I'm pleased with how well this cleans, I struggled with assembling. The directions were not clear to me and I usually have very little difficulty assemblying items. It's very heavy and very difficult for me to move it from grass to pavement. And don't even get me started on 2 steps up to the deck! The handle would benefit from some redesign. I also purchased the rotating brush and it's a great tool, although I think I need to purchase an extension wand so I don't have to put so much back into it. The electrical cord and hose are both of ample length Overall, I'm pleased I purchased the Sun Joe pressure washer.
customer_reviews.author: bizzeedee

customer_reviews.title: One season machine.
customer_reviews.text: Well, like many others, I’ve had this for a year, and it just stopped working. I pull it out to power wash my patio, it came on for 5 seconds, then just shut off. I don’t have time to buy another nozzle or even mess with it. I’m tossing it but hoping this review helps others from buying this after only working for one season. Extremely disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Bucci

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and is fairly strong for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and is fairly strong for the price. However, the pressure hose o-ring which connects to the gun broke after assembling for the 2nd time. Keep in mind, I received this two days ago and it broke on the second day. Using this without a o-ring resulted in a poor seal and water spraying everywhere. After searching through the reviews, it seems like this is a recurring problem!! Very disappointed. I'm not sure whether this is covered under warranty and I am reluctant to spend more money for another set of o-rings which may or may not break again.
customer_reviews.author: GoatyZ

customer_reviews.title: Review!
customer_reviews.text: Took 3-5 min to screw some things in was very easy. This electric pressure washer works great with my foam cannon from chemical guys. For water leaks I just added some Teflon tape for watertight seal and no water leaks was visible. Of course there’s a little but you can’t even notice it. One thing I love about it that it’ll go in a silent mode once you let go of the tigger on the wand. Oh yeah this thing is quiet! Strong and quiet. Just how I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Compact easy to use powerful w detergent tanks.
customer_reviews.text: Small and maneuverable, but weak link may be connection point for hose to machine. Use caution. (Mine did not break, but plastic fitting seems iffy.) Soap wand doesn’t boost pressure at all. Zero degree wand did marginally acceptable job of blasting off loose paint, but too narrow to do a whole wall in reasonable time. Resorted to 15 degree wand up close. Noise is loud but not enough to prompt wearing of ear protection. Maybe I should. Knob adjusts how fast detergent solution exits reservoirs, nice feature. Electric cord with GFCI is very long to keep connection away from wet working area. For the money and simplicity I really like this washer.
customer_reviews.author: gregory s buchler

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely loved the power this little machine has
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely loved the power this little machine has. The main reason for this purchase was to power wash our garage so we could stain the floor. Loved the results. Then we did the driveway, then mailbox, cars, truck, deck, siding of the house, windows... Before we realized, our entire house (on the outdoors) was sparkling, squeaky clean. Wish we could power wash inside the house as well ;-P
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Good product; does a good job
customer_reviews.text: Need some help around the house - this is the machine for you. We needed to wash down the garage floor - great job; power washed the shed inside and out to prepare for painting - great job; power washed the driveway and patio - great job. Easy to fill; easy to move; enough pressure for most household tasks. Stores easily in a small space. We highly recommend this power washer for your household needs.
customer_reviews.author: Cooey

customer_reviews.title: The Slow Joe
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this pressure washer, I quickly knew it did not have the pressure or the ability to get average household cleaning jobs done. I honestly was too tired to mess with taking it apart and messing with a return, so I decided to keep it. Not a good idea. It gets things clean if you’re right up on them, it has the pressure of a regular water hose that you stick your thumb over to make it spray out the bottom... Just not enough to do a side walk or deck in less than 5-6 hours. On top of that, it just completely stopped working. Don’t buy the slow joe.
customer_reviews.author: Kcolyalb

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect gasoline powered performance
customer_reviews.text: I got this pressure washer to clean the exterior of my house and my car. It barely takes the road scum off my car - which is okay because I'm not looking to peel paint. However, for things like blasting weeds from pavement - this model doesn't cut it. Here's what it's good at: -Removing scum from concrete walkways -Cleaning exterior vinyl siding -Washing the car Here's what it's NOT good at: -Removing embedded weeds from walkways -Blasting away moss overgrowing on concrete So, overall, it works for my needs but I could easily see needing to rent heavier duty equipment for more robust tasks. Thankfully, this pressure washer covers about 90%+ of my annual, regular needs.
customer_reviews.author: Champs McGee

customer_reviews.title: Nicely manufactured, excellent flexible hose
customer_reviews.text: Assembles with ease. Nice fit and finish (not a fan of the color but that's not an issue). Mine didn't come with the Brass connector, which is my only Con. Easy to maneuver w/ good sized wheels. The wand is well made and durable. The pressure hose is of high quality and surprisingly flexible. I used and liked he soap nozzle it's great for dispensing soap/ water mix. I ordered a hose extension and a multi tip nozzle to change with twist. I used the 40 deg fan to clean/ rinse the car. Great safety features, wand trigger lock and CFGI plug. I'm very happy with the purchase and it was fairly affordable for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated!! 🙁 (Updated)
customer_reviews.text: Twice this thing has stopped working for me. I have went through everything I know to do. I have only used this twice and it will shut off and I have to wait till later to try it again. I’m so frustrated! I’ve went through every trouble shooting I could find. I like the design though. I just want it to work! (Updated) I called customer support and the lady was very helpful. The company is going to replace my unit. Maybe I’ll have better luck with the next one.
customer_reviews.author: DFrazier

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this a week and love it! I’m cleaning long driveway and extra long sidewalk that haven’t been cleaned in years. Moss and grime buildup! I did use Krud Kutter on some areas and found it made the worst spots easier to clean. But not totally necessary. For safety reasons I realize it has none, but a clip to hold wand in on position would be great! At 77, my hands get really tired after holding it on for hours! Am considering getting round attachable brush—- any suggestions? 3 months later—- I called customer service to ask about a leak from underneath. Sending a new unit! I’ve had good customer service but this company is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Kay B

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on my ATVs. Unboxed it, thought what the heck, I will wash my truck. Finished my truck, the neighbor borrowed it to do his house. He finished his house, then my wife did the patio. Still haven't washed the ATVs, but everything else is clean. Not as powerful as the gas model I replaced - BUT - it is quiet. It does not need gas. It works great for what I need it for. If you need something to strip the paint off your old chevy, this is not the product. If you want to was the mud off your ATV you will have to wait awhile while everyone else borrows your tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uses less water, works as expected, it's worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely one of the best product's i have purchased! No it's not suitable for a contractor with big jobs where they need higher pressure for construction purposes. But it's wonderful for a homeowner who really should have! You want to use less water, use this! You want to have high pressure and maneuverability, use this! You want to spend less time cleaning, use this!! It's very quiet, it's strong, it really is a nice pressure washer!
customer_reviews.author: milbrook

product_meta.title: Sun Joe SPX3000 2030 Max PSI 1.76 GPM 14.5-Amp Electric High Pressure Washer, Cleans Cars/Fences/Patios
product_meta.description: Power. Performance. Versatility. The Pressure Joe SPX3000 electric pressure washer delivers it all to tackle a variety of cleaning tasks: homes, buildings, RV’s, cars, trucks, boats, decks, driveways, patios, lawn equipment and more. Packed with an 1800-Watt/14.5-amp motor, the Pressure Joe SPX 3000 generates up to 2030 PSI of water pressure and 1.76 GPM of water flow for maximum cleaning power. Remove tar and grease from concrete, heavy mildew stains, oil stains, rust from steel, caked mud on equipment, and other stubborn gunk and grime. Equipped with a dual detergent tank system the Pressure Joe SPX3000 carries and stores two different types of detergent simultaneously in its two .9L onboard removable detergent tanks. Conveniently switch between different detergents with its detergent selection dial and blast away all sorts of grime. Its 34-inch extension spray wand and rear wheels provide easy maneuverability and access to hard-to-reach areas such as 2 story buildings and the undersides of the automotive vehicles and lawn equipment. Tailor the pressure output of the spray to your cleaning needs with Pressure Joe's five quick spray nozzles. Other features include: 20 foot high pressure hose, 35 foot power cord, garden hose adaptor, and a TSS (Total Stop System) trigger that automatically shuts off the pump when the trigger is not engaged. Voltage 120 V ~ 60 Hz
feature_bullets: POWERFUL: 14. 5-Amp/1800-watt motor generates up to 2030 PSI/1. 76 GPM for maximum cleaning power and water inlet temperature (max) is 104 degrees Fahrenheit.

VERSATILE: Tackle a variety of cleaning tasks: homes, buildings, RV’s, cars, trucks, boats, decks, driveways, patios, lawn equipment, and more. With two 0. 9 L onboard detergent tanks, removable tanks carry and store different types of detergent to simultaneously tackle different cleaning projects.
TSS (Total Stop System): Automatically shuts off pump when trigger is not engaged to save energy and prolong pump life.
PRESSURE: Max rating per CSA test standards. Maximum internal pressure is 2030 PSI. Under typical load, working pressure is 1450 PSI

WE’VE GOT YOU COVERED! : Your new pressure washer is backed by the Snow Joe + Sun Joe customer promise. We will warrant new products for two years from the date of purchase. NO QUESTIONS ASKED. Contact Snow Joe + Sun Joe Customer Support at 1-866-766-9563 for further assistance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars17,055 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
